name: Sunny Land Forest Prototype
description:
This is a prototype platformer game made with Unity. You can play this little part of the game and test mecanics.

Wait for more updates and new levels. ;)

CONTROLS

A D or Arrow Keys to move player
Spacebar to jump

CREDITS

Programming, level design and sound fx by @gustavoslarsen
Pixel art by @ansimuz
Music by @ozzednet
